title: West Bromwich Albion F.C.
summary: West Bromwich Albion Football Club (/ˈbrɒmɪdʒ, -ɪtʃ/), commonly referred to as West Brom, is an English professional football club based in West Bromwich, West Midlands, England. They compete in the EFL Championship, the second tier of English football. The club was formed in 1878 and has played at its home ground, The Hawthorns, since 1900.
